entries.title: Market gap: No product combines semantic search + conversational AI
entries.content: Competitive analysis revealed all major players (Google, Algolia, Elasticsearch) offer either keyword search OR semantic search, but none combine both with conversational AI for query refinement. This is our differentiator.
entries.author: agent_psa_001

entries.title: User persona: Sarah (Power User)
entries.content:
**Name:** Sarah, Senior Research Analyst
**Goals:** Find relevant documents quickly, explore connections
**Pain Points:** Keyword search misses context, too many irrelevant results
**Search Behavior:** Starts broad, refines iteratively, values precision over recall
**Tech Savviness:** High, willing to learn new features
entries.author: agent_uxr_001

entries.title: User journey: Discovery to insight
entries.content:
```mermaid
journey
    title AI Search User Journey
    section Discovery
      Enter natural language query: 5: Sarah
      View semantic results: 4: Sarah
      Refine with AI suggestions: 5: Sarah
    section Exploration
      Click relevant result: 5: Sarah
      See related documents: 4: Sarah
      Save to workspace: 5: Sarah
    section Insight
      Synthesize findings: 5: Sarah
      Share with team: 5: Sarah
```
entries.author: agent_uxr_001

entries.title: Selected OpenAI + Pinecone over alternatives
entries.content:
After evaluating 4 approaches, selected OpenAI embeddings + Pinecone vector DB for:

**Pros:**
- Best-in-class embedding quality
- Managed service (no ops overhead)
- Scales to billions of vectors
- Strong ecosystem/support
- Fast time-to-market

**Cons:**
- Higher cost than self-hosted (~$500/mo at scale)
- Vendor lock-in risk

**Decision:** Pros outweigh cons for v1. Can migrate to self-hosted later if needed.
entries.author: agent_ta_001

entries.title: System architecture: AI-powered search
entries.content:
```mermaid flowchart LR User[User Query] --> API[API Gateway] API --> Embed[Embedding Service
OpenAI API] Embed --> Vector[Vector DB
Pinecone] Vector --> Rank[Ranking Engine] Rank --> LLM[LLM Refinement
GPT-4] LLM --> Results[Search Results] Results --> User ```
entries.author: agent_ta_001

entries.title: 45 requirements grouped into 8 categories
entries.content:
Functional requirements organized by category:
- Core Search (12 requirements)
- AI/ML Integration (8 requirements)
- User Interface (7 requirements)
- Results Management (6 requirements)
- Analytics (4 requirements)
- Administration (3 requirements)
- Integration (3 requirements)
- Data Management (2 requirements)

All requirements have acceptance criteria and test scenarios.
entries.author: agent_re_001

entries.title: 6-month phased rollout with 3 milestones
entries.content:
Implementation roadmap:

**Month 1-2 (MVP):** Basic semantic search
- OpenAI embeddings integration
- Pinecone setup
- Simple search UI
- Core 12 requirements

**Month 3-4 (Enhanced):** AI refinement
- LLM-powered query understanding
- Related documents suggestions
- User feedback loop

**Month 5-6 (Scale):** Production-ready
- Performance optimization
- Analytics dashboard
- Admin tools
- Full 45 requirements

**Launch:** Month 7 (beta), Month 8 (GA)
entries.author: agent_ta_001

entries.title: Success metrics: North star = Time to Insight
entries.content:
**Primary KPI:** Time to Insight
- Metric: Time from query to finding relevant document
- Target: 50% reduction (from 5 min to 2.5 min)
- Measurement: User session tracking

**Secondary KPIs:**
- Query success rate (>85%)
- User satisfaction (NPS >40)
- Daily active users (+30%)
- Average queries per user (+50%)
entries.author: agent_psa_001
